title.narrative: Grid-Connected RE Development Support (ADERC) - Transmission Phase II

description.narrative: The project will finance transmission infrastructure in the Northern part of the country, aimed at increasing the commercialization of energy in the Regional Electricity Market, as well as the share of RE in the generation matrix. SREP resources will allow reaching the results of the project related to the increase of RE installed capacity and the reduction in the curtailment of existing RE capacity. The project will facilitate access of 70 MW of clean renewable energy sources (PV, wind, and biomass) to the grid

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
